SoftwareType.Name: Game Hacker
SoftwareType.Description: For all of those people that just don't waste money on games that they can just hack!

Feature.Name: Money Hack
Feature.Description: Hacks the money of any game, but be careful not to get caught using it, the game might not like that.

Feature.Name: Stats Hack
Feature.Description: Hacks not only the money, but the stats as well, just again, dont get caught.

Feature.Name: Surveys
Feature.Description: Make surveys so the people cant get the actual hack, but you get money every time they click on a link to finish the survey. LOTS OF MONEY FOR YOU!
